Name: Match Win
Description: Reward for winning an official match

Name: League Runner-up
Description: Reward for finishing second in the league

Name: League Third Place
Description: Reward for finishing third in the league

Name: League Solidarity Fund
Description: Solidarity reward for all other league positions

Name: League Promotion
Description: Reward for promotion to a higher division

Name: Cup Champion
Description: Reward for winning the national cup

Name: Cup Runner-up
Description: Reward for reaching the cup final

Name: European Champion
Description: Reward for winning the European tournament

Name: European Runner-up
Description: Reward for reaching the European final

Name: Group Stage
Description: Reward for participating in the group stage

Name: Playoff
Description: Reward for participating in the playoff stage

Name: Round of 16
Description: Reward for reaching the Round of 16
